Type Parameters:
T - type of StreamsApp created by this application
All Implemented Interfaces:

public final class SimpleKafkaStreamsApplication<T extends StreamsApp> extends KafkaStreamsApplication<T>
KafkaStreamsApplication without any additional configuration options.
